statements: SELECT * FROM user_access_logs;
SELECT user_id, accessed_data FROM user_access_logs WHERE access_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, user_id, accessed_data, access_time FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs WHERE accessed_data LIKE '%private%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY access_count DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time, accessed_data FROM user_access_logs;
SELECT user_id, accessed_data, access_time, log_id FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id), accessed_data FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY accessed_data HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS login_count FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY login_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs;
SELECT user_id, access_time, accessed_data FROM user_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_time, accessed_data FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT data_id, user_id, data_type FROM sensitive_data_tracking WHERE access_granted = TRUE;
SELECT data_id, user_id, data_type FROM sensitive_data_tracking WHERE data_type = 'financial' ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, accessed_data, access_time FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_access_logs ORDER BY user_id
SELECT user_id, accessed_data FROM user_access_logs WHERE accessed_data LIKE '%credit card%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id = 2 AND access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY access_time
SELECT data_type, COUNT(*) FROM sensitive_data_tracking WHERE access_granted = true GROUP BY data_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT * FROM user_access_log ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, accessed_table_name FROM user_access_log WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT data_description FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE permission_level = 'admin' ORDER BY user_role ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_access_log WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT accessed_table_name, COUNT(*) as num_accesses FROM user_access_log GROUP BY accessed_table_name;
SELECT data_id, data_description FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_owner = 'Admin' AND LENGTH(data_description) > 50;
SELECT user_role, permission_level FROM access_control WHERE access_type = 'write';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_access_log ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_id, action FROM logs WHERE action = 'login' AND timestamp >= '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT access_id, user_id, access_timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT data_id, data_content, data_owner FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_owner = '78901234-5678-9012-3456-789012345678';
SELECT * FROM logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action FROM logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_owner = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT u.user_id, u.access_type, l.timestamp FROM user_access u JOIN logs l ON u.user_id = l.user_id;
SELECT access_id, user_id, MAX(access_timestamp) AS latest_access FROM access_logs GROUP BY access_id, user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs;
SELECT accessed_data, access_time FROM user_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_type FROM user_access_logs WHERE access_type = 'READ';
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT category_name FROM data_categories WHERE category_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs WHERE access_type = 'read';
SELECT log_id, accessed_data FROM user_access_logs WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_name, role_name FROM user_accounts JOIN user_role_mapping ON user_accounts.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
